talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adverturer's Guild Member Wilber$
Umm... Who... who are you?
(He's not looking well due to injuries)

$Cleric Edan$
...We're too late.
(Edan frowns like he's in pain)

$Injured Adventurer$
(Seems to have lost consciousness)

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
Angelica and Edan went out to find the Black Knight.
That evil man, I never thought he would take the Prophet...
(Deckard sighs)

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
The Black Knight is a stranger who appeared recently.
It may only be a rumor, but some say the Black Knight is a dragon follower or a servant of the dragons. He is a dangerous man.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
...You're saying a dangerous thing, little girl. Who told you that?!
Don't talk about that somewhere else, or you'll get into trouble.
(Deckard worries about me)

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Recently, there has been a rise in the cases of fighting between Saint Haven's soldiers and the monsters of Black Mountain. The Black Knight was often sighted at the battles so he was considered a dangerous man.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(So he was indeed the Black Knight...!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
And he destroyed two airships traveling from Saint Haven to Calderock.
Who would have thought his purpose was to get a hold of the power of the Ancients....
He is a really evil man!!

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Everyone left for the Forest Sanctuary to capture that Black Knight and rescue that kidnapped girl.
A young girl like you shouldn't go to dangerous places like that.
Did you hear me?

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Yes. You're not young, little girl. Anyway, don't go anywhere dangerous.
I'm busy right now, so I'll play with you later~
(Deckard keeps treating you like a child)

$Injured Adventurer$
(Seems to have lost consciousness )

$Injured Adventurer$
(Seems to have lost consciousness)

$Cleric Edan$
...You're only a child.
Please get to safety while I cover you.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
I hope the adventurers who went to the Forest Sanctuary are all safe.
...Hmm? Little girl, I'm really busy, so go over there and play by yourself quietly, okay?

$Injured Adventurer$
I'm okay but help my colleagues who went inside to chase the Black Knight...!
Ahh....

$Adventurer's Guild Member Wilber$
Umm... Who... who are you?
(He's not looking well due to injuries)

$Adventurer's Guild Member Wilber$
Ahh... Am I imagining things? How could there be a little girl at such a place.... wow!
...While I was chasing the Black Knight, I was struck once, and I can't remember from then on. Ahh....

$Adventurer's Guild Member Wilber$
Well... I think he went to the Sanctuary Core... Ahh...
I'm not sure what happened next.
Ahh.... I have to help the other guild members...
(It seems he has difficulty talking due to his injuries)

$Adventurer's Guild Member Wilber$
We have to hurry and chase the Black Knight...!! Ahh...!
(It seems he has difficulty talking due to his injuries)

$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
Oh, you're {user_nick}. We've met at Mana Ridge.
What brings a little girl like you to such a dangerous place…?
Are you hurt?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Prophet... What about the descendant of the Ancient people?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan$
I was about to return to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard to report.
{user_nick}, you better go back to town too.
There's nothing here anymore.

$Cleric Edan$
The Black Knight was too strong for me to handle....
Angelica and I attacked him to rescue the Prophet, but we failed....

$Cleric Edan$
He disappeared after almost killing us. If that beautiful silver-haired woman didn't save us, I don't know what would have happened to us....
(Edan sighs)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I wish I had the communicator with me so that I can ask my sister about it...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan$
Well, I have never seen her before.
Angelica returned to town first, and I stayed back to look for any evidence. But, there is nothing out of the ordinary.

$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
Now, I'm going to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard to report.
It should be quiet around here for a while. But monsters may appear anytime so please go to somewhere safe.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
Hmm... I've heard the news from Cleric Edan and Sorceress Angelica. I never thought the ambush team would be wiped out....
The Black Knight was far stronger than I thought. Llittle girl, are you alright? Did you get hurt?

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
That's a relief. When I heard from Edan that you went to that dangerous place, I was really surprised.
You shouldn't go to such dangerous places, kid....

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't see, do you know who that is?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Oh, and he said that some silver-haired woman came to their rescue when they were attacked by the Black Knight.
Did you see that woman, too? That silver-haired swordswoman?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Somebody's Work I
journal.contents:
According to Master Archer Adelynn, someone snatched the Prophet. Go to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard and ask for details.

Calderock Village → Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard

journal.title: Somebody's Work II
journal.contents:
Black Knight took the girl and traveled to the Forest Sanctuary. Go through the North Gate of the Calderock Village, pass the Gray Ruins and go to the Forest Sanctuary. You may be able to listen to the full story from the injured adventurers.

Gray Ruins (Sanctuary Entrance) → Forest Sanctuary (Injured Adventurer)
journal.destination: Talk to an adventurer at the Forest Sanctuary
journal.todo_msg: Meet the injured adventurer at the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Somebody's Work III
journal.contents:
It seems like the Black Knight went deep into the Forest Sanctuary.
Go deep into the Forest Sanctuary and chase the Black Knight.

Gray Ruins (Sanctuary Entrance) → Forest Sanctuary
journal.destination: Chase the Black Knight at the Forest Sanctuary
journal.todo_msg: Find the Black Knight deep inside the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Somebody's Work IV
journal.contents:
There is no trace of the Prophet nor the Black Knight. Sorceress Angelica is also not here. Instead, Cleric Edan is inside. Ask him what happened.

Gray Ruins (Sanctuary Entrance) → Forest Sanctuary (Cleric Edan)
journal.destination: Talk to Cleric Edan at the Forest Sanctuary

journal.title: Somebody's Work V
journal.contents:
Edan and Angelica got badly defeated by the Black Knight. Angelica already went back to town, so go to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard and ask about the silver-haired swordswoman who saved them.

Calderock Village → Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: Return and talk to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard.
